title: Central bank chief suspended in Latvia corruption scandal
description: Imagine the turmoil if Mark Carney, the Bank of England governor, had spent the weekend under arrest following allegations from a leading bank that he had been seeking and accepting bribes - all as payments from another top UK bank had been suspended while it was under investigation for laundering m...

title: Interest rates: Why have they been cut and what does it mean?
description:
The Bank of England has cut interest rates to 4%, marking the lowest level for more than two years.

In a tight decision, rate-setters at the bank opted to cut rates for the third time this year.

The bank reduced the rate despite an uptick in inflation, as households see increased energy and food c...
